title: Disconnects in Client
body:
Hey guys,
since some patches i have some problems with my connection in the LoL Client. My internet connection works perfectly fine otherwise but when i'm in the Client every 30-60 seconds theres the message "Trying to reconnect" popping up and im getting back to home screen. The message goes away after 2 seconds but it makes it impossible to play a game, because everytime i'm in queue and this message comes i'm getting thrown out of queue. Would really aprecciate if someone could help me with this.

replies.body:
Your internet could be fine on the rest of your computer, but it sounds like there might be a interruption with your network reaching the server for League.

I suggest checking out this [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) for some tips on how to fix your connection. Be sure to go through each of them so you can pin point what's causing that "Trying to reconnect" window to pop up. If you're still running into issues after completing all the steps, then [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our Tech team can provide some more help.
